Description: Rare & Beautiful Vintage 1978 Ibanez Japan Artist Model 2629 semi-hollow ES-335 style electric guitar == VG+ condition with play wear, light scratches, small dings (headstock), no cracks/repairs -- some fret & fingerboard wear first 3 frets -- light shirt haze on center of back but NO buckle rash -- binding all in good shape -- wear/patina to metal parts, mostly to pickups as shown -- all original except tuners have been replaced with newer Gotoh Japan units with NO modifications or new screw holes (Ibanez probably sourced the original tuners from Gotoh too -- I know they got at least some model tuners from Gotoh) == 3-piece Ibanez neck is straight with great consistent action all the way up == Guitar cleaned and lightly polished, fretboard cleaned & conditioned, fresh 9-42 Slinkys == AND this guitar plays and sounds great -- this is a good one! == Original pickguard included but it's broken as shown == Includes original case in excellent condition, a few exterior nicks == Ebony fretboard, no rosewood, Worldwide OK! == Worldwide Shipping -- NOTE: International buyers NOTE: CITES as of 1 Jan. 2017 restricts all rosewoods (although most are not endangered!!) -- our guitars may have rosewood components; check with your local customs to determine if this affects shipping to your country before purchase == If you are considering a purchase, please take a minute and read our feedback !!! We strive to achieve 5 star service !! PLEASE contact us if there are ANY problems BEFORE leaving feedback !! THANKS !! Payment within 3 days please == We pack extremely well and ship quickly as possible! PLEASE NOTE: Normal handling time is 3 business days or less, but we are out of town on buying trips once or twice a month which might result in a day or so delay !! If you are not certain, ask questions !!! We describe as accurately as possible and research well but we're NOT an experts nor a techs. Check our feedback and buy with confidence !! We're easy to contact !! We will leave feedback as soon as we receive yours. …Also check our other listings for more neat Vintage/used Instruments & Amps, Vintage Clothes, Jewelry, Collectibles, Electronics and Eclectica. !!!! If you have a problem with an item, please contact us before leaving feedback - we will work with you to resolve !!! International Bidders Please contact us well before the last 24 hours for a shipping quote !! You are responsible for all customs fees, duties, and taxes. We will not alter values or list as gift. AK& HI may be a bit more, too = check with us !! (Best way to ship to AK or HI is USPS) Please !! == keep your shipping material until you’ve checked for shipping damage – the shipping company may want to examine packaging !! We pack very well, but on rare occasions damage may occur - that’s why we insure !! We will assist you in collecting from shipping company !! (Also, I recommend having guitars set up professionally to your liking, our tastes may vary !!) PLEASE !!!!! Be certain you can afford an item BEFORE you make a bid or offer !!! THANK YOU !! NO PARTIAL REFUNDS - We have a return policy Texas residents pay sales tax – the governor gets it, not us !!
